title: AASQ Callout Reminder: Ask FSA about super compact gearing and ultra-short cranks for gravel
content:
Here’s a reminder to you all! This week, we have FSA joining us to field your questions on super compact gearing and ultra-short cranks for gravel riding. Summer is on the approach. There’s no better time to get your offroad adventure bike, gravel race bike, or bikepacking/touring bike dialed with an efficient drivetrain that best […]

The post AASQ Callout Reminder: Ask FSA about super compact gearing and ultra-short cranks for gravel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
